projects.title: DietLine
projects.description: DietLine is a cutting-edge platform designed to transform the way individuals approach nutrition, health, and overall well-being. In a world where health-conscious decisions can be overwhelming due to the sheer number of available diets, supplements, and meal plans, DietLine stands out by offering a specialized, comprehensive solution for those seeking personalized, effective, and sustainable dietary guidance.

projects.title: Rooznegar Calendar
projects.description: Rooznegar Calendar is a free Persian Calendar with an old history and we were inspired by "Herodotus history" for this calendar.

projects.title: Alobodo
projects.description: Alobodo is a free platform developed to create a bridge between those who seek certain on-the-spot services and those who provide mobile services in every field ranging from construction, building, gardening, plumbing and, welding, all the way to fixing electrical appliances, home-schooling, coaching, nursing children and elders, and repairing consumer electronic devices.

projects.title: Shahin Language
projects.description: Shahin Language application is provided to teach different languages for Persian speakers.
